articles.description: Elon Musk has praised Donald Trump as the only candidate “to preserve democracy in America." The SpaceX and Tesla CEO stood alongside the GOP nominee at a rally Saturday in Butler, Pennsylvania, where Trump had survived an assassination attempt in July. Musk …

articles.title: Three Pending Supreme Court Rulings That May Change America - Newsweek
articles.description: The Supreme Court will consider ghost guns, puberty blockers, and online porn in its new term.
articles.content:
The new Supreme Court term begins on Monday, October 7. With it comes major cases that will help define life in the United States, from gun control to online pornography.
